name: Jumping Jacks
description: A great warm-up exercise to get your heart rate up.

name: Bodyweight Squats
description: Simple squats using your own body weight.

name: Wall Sit
description: Hold a seated position against a wall to build endurance.

name: High Knees
description: Raise your knees quickly in place for a cardio burn.

name: Plank
description: A core strength exercise that also helps with posture.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward and bend your knees to work your legs.

name: Arm Circles
description: Warm-up move to loosen shoulder joints.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lift your hips off the ground to engage your glutes.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Fast-paced move to get your heart rate up.
